overview: From the chaos of Kerr weaving thru the crowd at his beloved Snapper Rocks, above the lip and tight in the pocket Bali attack, backside punts that leave you disheveled at Macaroni's, massive Barbados pits, getting his fair share at Hawaii's infamous Pipeline and plenty more will get you amped to hit the salt and do some Kerrazy's.
title: The Kerrazy Kronicles
